metadata.name: Shakti #17
metadata.description:
The Shakti #17 is a special edition created to thank all the followers of my series "The Elements" for their support this year, this open edition will be available for 48 hours.

Burning from three editions onwards of it will serve as a key to redeem new works in the future of my most relevant series (Dark matters, miCElio, Rusted Saints and The Elements).

Are you willing to burn some editions to get new works?
